website_summaries.verdict: A simple, rustic banner that you can reuse for multiple occasions.
pros: Rustic burlap banner is aesthetically pleasing
Can be reused at future showers, gender reveal parties, in babies bedrooms, or at baby photo shoots
6-foot banner comes with extra twine for hanging
cons: Like most burlap, this banner will shed a little

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon to the rescue! I needed some last minute decorations for my brother's baby shower, and this banner popped up. For $9.99, and prime 2 day shipping, I was not sure what I would get. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the product. It was exactly as pictured. It does shed a bit, but with some burlap products, it's unavoidable. It certainly was not a problem for a 1 day party. There is plenty of string to hang the banner, and it's already pre-strung. No typos with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this for baby shower decor. We took several group pictures with it and the mom to be was happy to take home to use as nursery decor. Looks just like the pic online. Great quality. Not cheap or flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Super cute banner
customer_reviews.text: Super cute banner! If you are going for a rustic vibe for your baby shower, banner will work perfectly. Well made, looks exactly as pictured. Fast shipping and good price. I was going to make one myself but saw this one and though it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I love the design
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, font, color, fabric. I used this cute banner on my baby's 3 month milestone photoshoot, and it was a good decision. This banner makes a very natural background in the photographs, because of the natural sand color of burlap. However, the burlap terribly shed debris. From the moment I take this out of the box, whenever I touch it, whenever I move it around, it keeps shedding the burlap debris... It made my room messy. And it has some smells too. Not terrible, but you might want to air it out for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald City

customer_reviews.title: It is a super cute banner that is well constructed
customer_reviews.text: It is a super cute banner that is well constructed, already strung together for you. The string is long at each end which was nice. It does shed some “hair” from the burlap.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for pictures and baby shower
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter's baby shower. It came one time and was packaged very nicely. I apprecaite the quality of the product for the price. It will be a great addition for my daughter's pictures during her baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute banner
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality no assembly. Was a cute addition to the baby shower. I would buy this again!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Great service, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely happy with my purchase from Sterling James from start to finish! They kept me in the loop with the order confirmation, shipping progress and followed up to make sure I was satisfied. I wish all companies operated this way! They took the skeptism out of online shopping! Oh, and the 'Oh Boy' burlap banner I purchased for a baby shower was totally awesome, too!
customer_reviews.author: kim pisano

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the shower and maternity pics. Cute! The cord is long enough to hang it and then trim and use for decoration in a nursery.

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with my purchase of the Oh Boy banner
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with my purchase of the Oh Boy banner. It is true to the photo and will be just right for the baby shower. One of the features is that the string is very long on either side. Since I haven't seen the venue, I don't yet know where I will hang it, the length of the string gives me lots of options. Happy with my purcchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute for baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: Cute & easy to hang! I painted the blue heart with green acrylic paint to match my baby shower theme. I will also be hanging it in the baby’s room afterwards.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute banner. Only complaint is that the individual ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute banner. Only complaint is that the individual flags are sewn into place, so its impossible to adjust the length. It worked across my mantle, but dipped down a little lower than ideal. Would measure before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Monica G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby announcement photographs.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what was pictured. Worked well for a backdrop for our baby announcement photographs. Actual burlap instead of the burlap prints you see from cheap products.

customer_reviews.title: Spelled wrong
customer_reviews.text: My sister is having a baby shower in just a couple days now, I ordered this banner with plenty of time to spare but I wasn't expecting to return it the day after I received it. When opened the box & pulled out the banner I realized that boy was spelt "bby" I returned it 4 days ago & have now received a refund or a message from Amazon at all. Probably not going to re order this one..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality burlap runner
customer_reviews.text: Good quality burlap runner. I was hosting a baby shower and needed a streamer. For 9.99, it's a good price and good quality, you can't beat it. I highly recommend. The customer service from the seller was great too, super friendly and responsive.

product_meta.title: Oh Boy Burlap Banner - Baby Shower Decorations for Boy - Gender Reveal Party
feature_bullets: Congratulations on your baby announcement! It's a boy! What better way to celebrate than with our hand strung, premium quality burlap banner. Our baby shower decorations will add that taste of rustic decor and welcome your bundle of joy into the world.

SIZE: Your banner measures 6 feet and comes with plenty of extra twine making it easy to hang. These are perfect baby shower supplies that will fit any theme from an outdoor rustic farm to an indoor monkey or elephant jungle safari.
SO MANY USES: Use as baby shower photo props at your gender reveal party or to decorate your baby's nursery. Try hanging it over the dessert or gift table, or on the porch to greet the shower guests.

QUALITY: Letters are printed on hand cut 7x5.5 inch burlap flags and then hand-strung with plenty of extra twine for easy hanging. The high quality printed letters and blue heart will definitely catch the attention of your loved ones.
GUARANTEE: We stand by our banners with a 100% money back guarantee. If this baby shower banner does not make you and your loved ones smile, then your money back.
